details:
verb
- keep informed
= synonyms: keep up
- behave in accordance or in agreement with
= synonyms: conform to
- keep to
= synonyms: stick to, stick with
- grasp the meaning
= example: grasp the meaning
- follow, discover, or ascertain the course of development of something
= example: follow, discover, or ascertain the course of development of something
= synonyms: trace
- perform an accompaniment to
= example: perform an accompaniment to
= synonyms: play along, accompany
- imitate in behavior
= synonyms: take after
- travel along a certain course
= example: travel along a certain course
= synonyms: travel along
- to travel behind, go after, come after
= example: to travel behind, go after, come after
- follow in or as if in pursuit
= synonyms: pursue
- keep under surveillance
= example: keep under surveillance
= synonyms: survey
- choose and follow
= synonyms: adopt, espouse
- be the successor (of)
= example: be the successor (of)
= synonyms: succeed, come after
- work in a specific place, with a specific subject, or in a specific function
= synonyms: be
- follow with the eyes or the mind
= synonyms: watch
- act in accordance with someone's rules, commands, or wishes
= synonyms: abide by, comply
- adhere to or practice
= example: adhere to or practice
- accept and follow the leadership or command or guidance of
= example: accept and follow the leadership or command or guidance of
- to be the product or result
= synonyms: come
- be later in time
= example: be later in time
= synonyms: postdate
- come as a logical consequence
= example: come as a logical consequence
= synonyms: fall out
- come after in time, as a result
= example: come after in time, as a result
= synonyms: come after
- be next
= example: be next
- to bring something about at a later time than
= example: to bring something about at a later time than
